title: Roasted breast duck with baby vegetables and cherries
description: A restaurant-style dish of duck with a homemade jus flavoured with port, star anise, cinnamon and thyme.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves, peeled and left whole
1 vanilla pod, cut in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
1 bunch baby carrots, peeled and trimmed
1 bunch baby turnips, halved and trimmed
20 cherries soaked in liqueur (such as Griottine), stones removed
2 tbsp baby beetroot cress or baby chard
